entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Penticton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Penticton Airport 06:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: SSE 31 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow early this morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Snow mixed with rain beginning this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain at times mixed with snow early in the morning. Snow level rising to 700 metres in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
